text: Wash your hands after you touch money or anything dirty.
Mop in Figure-8 motions for best coverage.
Old avocado spoils new avocado.  Never mix them!
Knives are sharp!  Use caution!  Never leave knives submerged in sink water!
Bored?  Prep. DB/DTs. Consolidate Bread. Dishes. Clean Store/Kitchen. Stock. Get Creative.
